QAData.question: Who won between Brighton & Hove Albion and Leicester City on Sun, 04 Sep 2022 13:00:00 GMT?
QAData.answer: Brighton & Hove Albion won 5–2 over Leicester City on Sun, 04 Sep 2022 13:00:00 GMT.

funFacts.fallback: Pascal Gross created the most chances (5) in the match.
Lewis Dunk completed the most passes (89) in the match.
Solly March completed the most dribbles (4) in the match.
Solly March won the most duels (10) in the match.
Wilfred Ndidi committed a foul leading to a penalty for Brighton & Hove Albion.
Patson Daka has the least touches (29) of any outfield player.
Alexis Mac Allister was Player of the Match with a rating of 9.21.
Luke Thomas scored an own goal.
